items.sentence: I\'ve always wondered what it\'d be like to have siblings.
I met my teacher by accident at the restaurant last night.
Tom did three weeks\' worth of work in just one afternoon.
Tom didn\'t have enough money to buy everything he wanted.
Tom had to take care of Mary\'s son while she was working.
The French teacher was stumped by her student\'s question.
The girl we saw waiting in front of Tom\'s house was Mary.
I\'ve heard that sitting up straight is bad for your back.
Tom and Mary were sitting next to each other on the plane.
Tom and Mary were trapped in the elevator for three hours.
Tom and Mary were walking through the park, holding hands.
Tom and his friends often play cards until after midnight.
Tom asked Mary if she really wanted to do that by herself.
I think Beethoven is the greatest composer who ever lived.
I understand that you and Tom are planning to get married.
I wonder whether or not Tom is having as much fun as Mary.
Who did Tom think was going to help him with his homework?
Who do you think is the most beautiful girl in your class?
Who wants to be cooped up indoors on a nice day like this?
Why did you do that without telling Tom you were going to?
